name: Detroit Marriott Troy

reviews.title: Nice Hotel
reviews.text: Stayed at the Troy Marriott on Saturday, February 18 and Sundy, February 19. We had room 1503. Our rate was $108.00 per night.
The room was very nice and luxurious. Bedding is very soft and comfortable. Room was clean. Bathroom is nice and spacious with Bath and Body works products.
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay
This Is A Great Hotel
reviews.text: Staff was very friendly and helpful at check in time.

reviews.title: The only choice in Troy
reviews.text: The only disappointment was the conceigre (spelling?) lounge. It was not staffed and the offerings were minimal at best. Do not pay extra for this service - it isn't worth it.

description: Discover the upscale, contemporary design of a Troy, Michigan hotel in affluent Oakland County near downtown Detroit, The Somerset Collection, Chrysler, GM Tech Center and TACOM, as well as The Palace of Auburn Hills, home of the Pistons. This hotel boasts comfortable accommodations featuring an array of pleasing amenities such as 37" flat screen TVs and spacious baths with marble details. Travelers will appreciate the many thoughtful touches at this 350-room hotel, including wireless high-speed Internet access, well-appointed work-stations and deluxe bedding, as well as on-site restaurant, 200 west. The reinvented hotel lobby features plush seating, state of-the-art technology and creative food and beverage concepts in a stylish setting—all designed to meet the needs of today’s travelers. As a certified Michigan Green Lodging Facility, you can count on the Detroit Marriott Troy hotel to provide you with a comfortable and eco-friendly stay each and every time you visit.
